altername_name: Pop de Cute na Shinri Test: Alabama
Pop de Cute na Shinri Test: Alabama
name: Alabama: Pop de Cute na Shinri Test
overview: Alabama - Pop de Cute na Shinri Test is an interactive story game in which the player can watch an animated story that will advance in different ways depending of the player choices to different questions that the game will ask him during the story. The main character of the game is 20 years old girl called Alabama that works everyday at an office with a hard boss but one day she received an email and when she opens it the strange dog took her throught the computer monitor and takes her into a wonderful and strange world where she will start her journey travel with that mysterious dog in his car and there she will meet strange people and wacky situations. The story is divided into 6 different chapters (with a prologue and an epilogue). The game features two mini-endings of 30 minutes each and which one the player will get are based on the results of psychological tests and the results of the mini-games.
